articles.summary: Bitcoin (BTC) dropped 3% to $98,550.33 as of press time. Bitcoin broke support at $100,000 for the third time this month. Bitcoin is being hit by cascading liquidations, persistent ETF outflows, and a broader risk-off posture across digital assets.

articles.title: XRP Earns Academic Praise: University Study Calls It ‘Gold In Your Hands'
articles.author: News BTC
articles.summary: The Bipartisan Market Structure Draft in the US Senate would divide oversight between the Commodity Futures Trading Commission and the Bitcoin and XRP exchanges. The bill has reignited the debate about whether XRP is a commodity or a security, as some reports claim.

articles.title: Switzerland's FUTURE Raises CHF 28 Million to Build 'Europe's Premier Bitcoin Treasury&#
articles.author: Donna Hancock
articles.summary: Switzerland-based FUTURE raised CHF 28 million to expand as Europe's leading institutional Bitcoin treasury platform. Fulgur Ventures, Nakamoto and TOBAM are some of Bitcoin's best-known institutional investors. CHF28 million is over $34 million.
